name: @simple-vectordb/wasm
description: WebAssembly bindings for SimpleVectorDB - A fast HNSW-based vector database

scripts.build:wasm: cd ../.. && mkdir -p build-wasm && cd build-wasm && emcmake cmake -DEMSCRIPTEN=1 .. && emmake make && cp simple-vectordb.js simple-vectordb.wasm ../packages/simple-vectordb-wasm/

author: Lakshman Peethani
